text: Mikhail Borisovich Mashkovtsev () is the former governor of Kamchatka Oblast from 2000 to 2007. He is a member of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation. The Prosecutor's Office of the Kamchatka region opened a criminal case against him in 2003. Maskhotsev does not enjoy Kremlin support. ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:Governors of Kamchatka Oblast Category:1947 births
title: Mikhail Mashkovtsev
